Legends.Item: Low blood pressure and cholesterol levels mean a healthy circulatory system.
Rising blood pressure and cholesterol will start damaging arteries that can lead to clogging.
High blood pressure and cholesterol will clog the blood pressure and cause problems sucha s stroke, heart attack, etc.
With a slim body and low LDL levels the liver has no problems.
A larger waist and rising LDL means the liver is accumulating fat.
Obesity and persistent high LDL cause fat to accumulate in the liver and leads to fatty liver.
With low blood pressure and low glucose allows the kidney to filter toxins out of the blood.
Rising blood pressure and glucose starts to impair kidney function to filter toxins.
Persistent high blood pressure and high glucosee levels have led to kidney damage and the kidney stops filtering toxins, causing diabetes.

Instructions.Item: 平たい表面を見つけなさい。
Double tap to confirm stage position
You have toggled the ribbon charts. This would allow you to focus on individual years.
You just hid the light blue panel background.
You just dimmed the bars. Click again to light them up.
You just hid the bars. Click again to show them.
You clicked too fast. Wait a second and try again.
You just pull the section to the right. Click again to move it back.
Health of organ has changed, Click on panel to learn more.

Tutorials.Item: Plane Finding
Bodylogical AR requires physical space to function. Move your device around a flat surface to let the camera scan for space. The scanned space will be highlighted in yellow.
Confirm Plane

Bodylogical AR requires physical space to function. Move your device around a flat surface to let the camera scan for space. The scanned space will be highlighted in yellow. When you have found an ideal surface, double tap the screen to place your stage.
Confirm Stage
Bodylogical AR has identified an anchor image. Move your image around and spin it to position your stage, and double tap the screen to fix its position.
Placing Stage
Move your device to adjust the position of the stage. Double tap to confirm its position.
Interaction
Touch an avatar to examine his/her stats. In general, click on AR objects, such as buttons, to interact.
Lifestyles
Click on the four icons to inspect the avatar's lifestyle.
Visualizations
After checking the lifestyle, click on the icon to begin the visualization and walk into the future of the avatar.
Activity
You will now see three variants of the same avatar, each with a separate "intervention", running on the street. Click "Play/Pause" to start the timing progress.
Progressing Time
Watch how the avatars are slowing down as they grow older. Click "Animate" again to pause the progress.
You can also drag the handle of the progress bar to jump to a specific time. Click "Reset" to go back to the present.
When you are done exploring, click "Next" to examine what caused these changes.
Prius
Check the panel on the right to inspect the details of the organs. Move your device closer to the avatar to see how Bodylogical works internally.
Internals
Each block represents an organ or a system. Watch how the biometrics are connected together and the data flow between different blocks.
Stats
The path is colored to show the health status of the avatar across the years. Additionally, the lifestyle of the three "interventions" are available. Click on the icons to show them.
